Class Path

java.lang.Object
  Path
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Path>
public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Path>

This class contains a path, and methods for finding new paths.

Author:
Martin T. Sandsmark
